metadata.name: Learnings and Troubleshooting
metadata.description: Historical learnings, troubleshooting patterns, and resolved issues

item.problem: Using Date.now() for keys creates duplicates in rapid renders
New dependencies not in import tests
Test runner fails due to argument parsing or Unicode encoding
item.critical: Fix test runner FIRST before running actual tests

issues.issue: Unicode emojis cause Windows terminal encoding errors
Parallel arguments must be properly formatted (--parallel=auto not --parallel auto)
Frontend test args should avoid Jest-specific options in unified runner

fix.title: Running Tests from Subdirectories
fix.problem: Test runner path needs adjustment in subdirectories
fix.note: Comprehensive tests may timeout with default 2-minute limit

fix.title: Startup Check False Warnings
fix.problem: Services showing as unavailable despite successful connections

root-causes.cause: Redis set() method parameter mismatch (expire vs ex)
Missing Redis delete() method in RedisManager
Missing await for async ClickHouse execute_query() method

fix.solution: Added backward compatibility, implemented delete method, added await
fix.prevention: Always verify method signatures match between caller and implementation

fix.title: ClickHouse Startup Check
fix.root-cause: Using wrong method name - should be execute_query() not execute()

fix.title: Database Schema Migration
fix.problem: Missing tables and columns causing schema validation errors
fix.columns-added: tool_permissions, plan_expires_at, feature_flags, payment_status, auto_renew, plan_tier, plan_started_at, trial_period

fix.title: Thread Creation 500 Error
fix.problem: Thread creation failing with '_AsyncGeneratorContextManager' object has no attribute 'execute'
fix.solution: Fixed parameter order to get_by_id(self, db, entity_id)

fix.title: Critical E2E Test Coverage Enhancement
fix.problem: Demo brittleness despite 60%+ coverage - tests focused on happy paths

root-causes.cause: Race conditions in Zustand store updates
Missing circuit breaker and retry logic tests
No tests for memory leaks or performance degradation

fix.solution: Implemented 50 critical e2e tests for failure scenarios

test-patterns.pattern: Network partition simulation: cy.intercept('**/ws**', { forceNetworkError: true })
Concurrent update testing: Fire multiple state updates in parallel
Circuit breaker validation: Track failure counts and verify degradation

fix.prevention: Always test failure scenarios, concurrent operations, network instability, memory usage, error cascades

fix.title: Staging Workflow Concurrency Control
fix.problem: Multiple commits in quick succession cause redundant builds and resource waste

root-causes.cause: No cancellation of in-progress workflows when new commits pushed
Parallel workflows consuming resources for outdated commits
Developers waiting for outdated workflows to complete

fix.solution: Added GitHub Actions concurrency groups with cancel-in-progress

implementation.exception: Destroy operations use separate group with cancel-in-progress: false

benefits.benefit: Only latest commit's workflow runs to completion
Reduced cloud costs from cancelled builds

fix.prevention: Always use concurrency groups for PR-based workflows to prevent redundant runs

focus.item: Complex dependency interactions (database, Redis, ClickHouse, LLM providers)
API endpoints with authentication and authorization
Critical data flows and error handling scenarios
